title: Forget Gravel: Old-School ‘Queen Stages’ Return to Rule the 2025 Tour de France
content:
The Tour goes 'back to the future' in 2025 with leg-sapping mountain sufferfests and few modern gimmicks - is that a good thing?

Read the full article at Forget Gravel: Old-School ‘Queen Stages’ Return to Rule the 2025 Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
